ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNRequisicao from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() requisicao = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_REQUISICOES"))
if(requisicao.Handle != None): podeAlterar = CNRequisicao.PodeAdicionarAlterarExcluir(requisicao.Handle) widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
